General.Name: Ratio Oil Explorations (1992) a Limited Partnership
General.Description: Ratio Energies - Limited Partnership explores, develops, and produces oil and natural gas in Israel. It has operations in Leviathan project. The company was formerly known as Ratio Oil Explorations (1992) " Limited Partnership and changed its name into Ratio Energies - Limited Partnership. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
